name: E-commerce Platform
description: Full-featured e-commerce platform with products, cart, checkout, and payment processing

customIssues.title: Create Product Catalog System
customIssues.description: Product models with categories, variants, inventory tracking

customIssues.title: Implement Shopping Cart
customIssues.description: Session-based cart with add/remove/update quantity functionality

customIssues.title: Build Checkout Flow
customIssues.description: Multi-step checkout with shipping, billing, and payment

customIssues.title: Create Order Management
customIssues.description: Order tracking, status updates, and admin dashboard

customIssues.title: Build Product Pages
customIssues.description: Product detail pages with images, reviews, and related products
